item.title: Summarizing data
item.description: The very first task in any project related to data modeling is to explore the data, formally known as, Overview Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) - There are many statistics that we calculate as part of EDA. However, in this chapter we will learn how to summarize data using descriptive statistics. Data is a collection of observations and there features (known as variables). When we try to summarize the data, the variable type plays an important role in deciding which statistic we will be considering to summarize the variable.
